name: doc_status
description: Indicates, whether processing has finished, HITL review is pending, etc.

name: doc_event_id
description: Optional - Id for the even that triggered the document processing

name: doc_group_id
description: Identifies the group of documents, this doc is part of

name: hitl_operation_id
description: If a HITL review is triggered, the operation id assigned to it. It is later used to match the HITL review output to the original document

name: destination_table_id
description: Used in case a HITL review is triggered, to identify the table where a new record should be added with the reviewed document entities
